API_Description: Moves a page within the document.

nPage.description: (optional) The 0-based index of the page to move. The default is 0.

nAfter.description: (optional) The 0-based index of the page after which to move the specified page. Use -1 to move the page before the first page of the document. The default is the last page in the document.

Examples:
Reverse the pages in the document.

```
for (i = this.numPages - 1; i >= 0; i--) this.movePage(i);
```
